info.name: Codeable - App Dark Mode
info.description: I created dark mode for the Codeable app. Most of the pages are styled and each individual element has been manually styled to work perfect in dark mode.
info.additionalInfo:
====== changelog - 5/12/2019 =========

- Fix "New Additional Task" popup dark mode issue

====== changelog - 5/12/2019 =========

- Fix "Additional Tasks" popup dark mode styling
- Fix "Withdraw Funds" popup dark mode styling
- Fix links color styling. 
- Made many success color improvements

====== changelog - 4/12/2019 =========

- Distinguish private comment with different background color.

====== changelog - 4/12/2019 =========

- Fix client/expert reviews popup dark mode issues
- Fix links hover color
- Fix attachment link color in the sidebar

====== changelog - 4/12/2019 =========

- Make calculator modal dark
- Make file upload box dark
- Fix many other small dark mode related issues
